properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT CC.ORDER_NO "CANCEL_ONO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "CANCEL_PNAME" , OP.ORDER_POPTION "CANCEL_OPOPTION" , OP.ORDER_PAMOUNT "CANCEL_OPAMOUNT" , O.PRICE "CANCEL_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" , CC_SLEDDING , CC_PAYMENT FROM SPMY_CANCEL CC, SPMY_ORDER O, SP_ORDERPRODUCT OP, TB_PRODUCT_UD P WHERE CC.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND CC.ORDER_PNUM = OP.ORDER_PNUM AND CC.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CC.ORDER_NO "CANCEL_ONO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "CANCEL_PNAME" , OP.ORDER_POPTION "CANCEL_OPOPTION" , OP.ORDER_PAMOUNT "CANCEL_OPAMOUNT" , O.PRICE "CANCEL_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" , CC_SLEDDING , CC_PAYMENT FROM SPMY_CANCEL CC, SPMY_ORDER O, SP_ORDERPRODUCT OP, TB_PRODUCT_UD P WHERE CC.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND CC.ORDER_PNUM = OP.ORDER_PNUM AND CC.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) T WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CC.ORDER_NO "CANCEL_ONO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "CANCEL_PNAME" , OP.ORDER_POPTION "CANCEL_OPOPTION" , OP.ORDER_PAMOUNT "CANCEL_OPAMOUNT" , O.PRICE "CANCEL_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" , CC_SLEDDING , CC_PAYMENT FROM SPMY_CANCEL CC, SPMY_ORDER O, SP_ORDERPRODUCT OP, TB_PRODUCT_UD P WHERE CC.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND CC.ORDER_PNUM = OP.ORDER_PNUM AND CC.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) T WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CC.ORDER_NO "CANCEL_ONO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "CANCEL_PNAME" , OP.ORDER_POPTION "CANCEL_OPOPTION" , OP.ORDER_PAMOUNT "CANCEL_OPAMOUNT" , O.PRICE "CANCEL_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" , CC_SLEDDING , CC_PAYMENT FROM SPMY_CANCEL CC, SPMY_ORDER O, SP_ORDERPRODUCT OP, TB_PRODUCT_UD P WHERE CC.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND CC.ORDER_PNUM = OP.ORDER_PNUM AND CC.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) T WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CC.ORDER_NO "CANCEL_ONO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "CANCEL_PNAME" , OP.ORDER_POPTION "CANCEL_OPOPTION" , OP.ORDER_PAMOUNT "CANCEL_OPAMOUNT" , O.PRICE "CANCEL_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" , CC_SLEDDING , CC_PAYMENT FROM SPMY_CANCEL CC, SPMY_ORDER O, SP_ORDERPRODUCT OP, TB_PRODUCT_UD P WHERE CC.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND CC.ORDER_PNUM = OP.ORDER_PNUM AND CC.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) T WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
